answers.answer: Call them back. I waited 5hrs before calling mine and turns out they forgot about me
Yeah call them don't be scared but isn't that a sign of toxcimia (probably misspelled) correct me please if I'm wrong I really don't remember.
I've called him back got snapped at by his nurse she said. hes busy its npt like your his only patient. he's got mpre important things to deal with.. now I'm just calling my husband @ work
Wtf is wrong with them? Its a sign of preeclampsia

Yes i think so as well . that's y I'm a little scared.. my mother in-law. said to call,my doctor because of that possiabilty.. I'm just a lil freaked out n after his nurses reaction a little pissed off/upset :(

Well eff her. I bet if you would've said you'd stay on hold, she would've done something. I'd go to the E.R. or L&D because swelling up that bad isn't something you just wait around to figure out why.

wow!!! What a rude nurse. I would tell him that she said that to you after waiting for 3 hours to get a call back but I would go to labor and delivery just to be certain its not pre eclampsia... and skip the dr for now since they are not responding to you!!!
Thanks ladies i have a few minutes until my mother in-law gets here.. then gone to the hospital. ill keep u guys posted :( wish me luck
I know i wanted to tell her off but I'm trying to remain calm

Please let your doctor know about the nurses reaction as well. I had a bad experience and spoke up. Turned out the nurse was upsetting many expecting mothers. I'll be praying for you and your bundle!!
That right preeclampsia not toxcimia...(misspelled) duh
It was nothing. they gave me fluids through I.V. and allergy tests did a bunch of other tests n sent mw home. maybe it was an allergic reaction were not sure but it hasn't happened yet
I ment it hasn't happened again..
Yes i will be seeing him n will be reporting her to my doctor. She's a really rude nurse, :)

question: I woke today hands, feet, and lips swollen like so bad i couldn't make a fist? I'm 30 weeks today.. i woke 3 hours ago n called my doctor waiting for a call back n the swelling is just gone down enough for me to use my hands
title: swollen
